text: Wo ceng shi feng gong su lai man qushi, feng zai shangwu zou yi yue de lucheng, zai xiawu ye zou yi yue de lucheng. Wo wei ta shi rong tong xiang quanshui yang yong chu. Youxie jingling feng zhu de mingling zai ta de mianqian gongzuo; shei weibeile wo de mingling, wo jiu shi shei changshi liehuo de xingfa
